name: BingoCaller
0:
”Alexa open bingo caller.”
”Alexa launch bingo caller.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bingo caller
des:
Have fun playing Bingo with Alexa!

Before you start this skill, all players should have their own Bingo card and something to mark it with. Bingo cards can be printed or purchased from many sources online.

The game uses standard Bingo cards with columns labeled "B", "I", "N", "G", and "O" from left to right. The "B" column should contain numbers between 1 and 15, the "I" column should contain numbers between 16 and 30, the "N" column should contain numbers between 31 and 45, the "G" column should contain numbers between 46 and 60, and the "O" column should contain numbers between 61 and 75.

Once you launch the skill, Alexa will serve as your Bingo caller! Mark your cards as the numbers are called. When you have a complete row, call out, "Alexa, Bingo!"

It is the same game of Bingo that everyone knows and loves, except Alexa is running the show!

Once you are ready to play, just say, "Alexa, open Bingo Caller!"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
